title: Morning Breakfast
text: Has a beautiful atmosphere inside with lovely displays of sweets. Unfortunately, the breakfast was poor in taste and appearance average. I had an Australian Avocado and my friends had the pancakes and poached eggs. For sure was not value for money and will not go again for breakfast. Possibly next time I might try their lunch menu with the business lunch offer.

title: Mom visits Acropolis
text: One of the best historical places I have visited. It's something everybody must do at least once in a lifetime. So this year I took my 80 year old mom for her first time. Acropolis has easy access for the elderly. Thank you Greece for making this possible.

title: Athens holiday with Mom
text: It was an excellent day trip with Mom and me siteseeing Athens and Pireas. Excellent prices and friendly staff ready to answer every question. We saw many beautiful places and had a magnificent time. Totally recommended as value for money!
place: Hop on Hop Off Classic tour of Athens

title: Christmas Holiday with Mom
text: Excellent service and friendly staff fro A-Z. I had an amazing time as the hotel is located in the center of Hermou with easy access to trains, metro and busses. Walking distance to many theatres and monastiraki. We had a beautiful view of Acropolis everyday for breakfast and evening drinks! Compliments to the chef for his tasty pancakes!

title: Transit Stop to Cyprus
text: Excellent flight and friendly staff on every flight. I always book my flights to Cyprus VIA Jordan as I love the airport and plane are always on time. Excellent transit hours to my final destination that allow my to have a relaxing dead sea massage at the airport. Totally recommended to book excursions into Jordan for longer transit waiting hours as they are visa free!

title: Corporate Brunch
text: I rate it as the best brunch by far in Abu Dhabi. Excellent food from different parts of the world in individual booths which reminds you a bit of global village. My compliments to the chef and the entire team. Everything was perfect from A-Z especially the outside poolside setting. We also loved the music and our guests had a blast dancing. Totally worth every penny of it!

title: VIP Guests
text: Special thanks to the manager of Glo Bar for assisting me with my VIP guests even though he was extremely busy. I love Glo pool bar as it has one of the nicests views at Maryah Island. One comment is that food service is very slow and can cause a strain to your guests. Something that needs to be looked into!

title: Farewell Lunch
text: It was a beautiful buffet lunch at Cuisene Restaurant with excellent service from Rojma that took our photo. The view was amazing overlooking the Sheik Zayed Grand Mosque. Totally reccomend it an will visit again.

title: Weekend Brunch
text: Excellent location. Beautiful surroundings. Lovely view. Value for money if you get tge weekend all day package of Radisson Blu Corniche with lunch at Vascos as they serve fresh fish and tasty salads! Must try!

title: Saturday Ouzeri
text: Beautiful surroundings located at one of the most attractive beach in Cyprus. Must vist the Ouzeri for a Cyprus meze cheese platter with local wine and ouzo on ice. Totally recommended. Very friendly and family oriented environment.

title: End of summer holidays
text: Best way to end your summer holidays is to enjoy a full day at this magnificent restaurant with one of the best views of Cyprus. Excellent international food n fresh fish with reasonable prices. Must ry while in Cyprus don't miss it!

title: Fulfilling Breakfast
text: If you are in Larnaca Cyprus you must pay a visit to this beautiful local cafe located in the heart of the city. Excellent service great prices and best if all excellent food which can be as good as home made!! Enjoy!!

title: Breakfast Treat
text: Amazing holiday breakfast treat at one of the best hotels I have ever visited. Five star service, quality, value for money and much much more. One of the finest and tastiest breakfast I have ever had. Special thanks to our host for the day Mrs. Soteroulla for her excellebt service n exceptional hospitality. Thank you all, you make a great team!

title: Weekend Camping Adventure
text:
This trip was one of the best adventures of my life. A must visit destination in Oman for camping, hiking, mountain trails, rock climbing and many, many unbelievable awesome sites. If you want to know how it feels to be at the top of the world then is it!! Too bad I can only give it a 5 because for sure its a definite 10*
Make sure you take warm clothes as temperature drops very low at night.

title: Morning Breakfast
text: Just below ordinary. Not recommended for foodies. The breakfast was like a small picnic in the park. For the price one pays the dishes need to be upgraded with quantity and quality. Over experience was good because of being with friends and shisha and not the food itself.

title: Weekend Yoga
text: Excellent place for your morning yoga either with friends or alone. I was there for the first yoga event in Abu Dhabi and totally loved it. It has an organic market for weekends and many places to have snacks or just chat with friends. Must visit!

title: Dinner with Friends
text:
Excellent sushi! Best I tasted in Abu Dhabi so far! Great atmosphere and good prices with specials on Friday and Saturday! Beautiful night view, just loved it!
Totally recommended

title: Visit to a Friend
text: Delicious and fresh pastries all day and night. I totally recommend their halloumi pitta and tahini pitta. Every time I visit I can eat one just by myself and they are really big:)

title: Drinks with Friends
text: Excellent place for your visitors to have a beautiful view of Abu Dhabi Skyline and enjoy a wonderful day by the pool or drinks at night. I had visitors and gave them a night out and we had an amazing time. Great atmosphere, delicious sushi and nice music. Totally recommended!

title: Business Lunch
text: Excellent food every time with a five star service. Beautiful setting and atmosphere for all your business lunch meetings. Totally recommended as prices are reasonable.

title: Last Iftar
text: As usual excellent food but below average salads and sweets. A great environment and friendly staff. Worth the experience in the center of Abu Dhabi. Always pleasant throughout the day!

title: Business Flight
text:
It was an awful day!! First the flight was delayed from Larnaca to depart and then we had to wait an additional extra 4 hours in Bahrain airport. Our flight was supposed to arrive in Abu Dhabi approximately 18:30 evening and we arrived at 23:30.
Was not the most convenient trip! Careful when planning this booking from Abu Dhabi to Cyprus and vice versa as it is not always on time:(

title: Business Lunch
text: Excellent relaxing atmosphere and beautiful friendly environment. I totally recommend it for your business lunch outings and evening gatherings. I loved the quiet setting of the restaurant that made my meeting extra special. Delicious and tasty Chinese food perfectly prepared for every taste bud!

title: Business Trip
text: Excellent location with well trained staff for all your business meetings and guest relations. My special thanks to Mr. George Dimitriou for his exceptional hospitality during our breakfast meeting with our guests from U.A.E. We had the friendliest atmosphere with a beautiful setting. Plenty of parking !

title: Evening Dinner
text: A nice atmosphere and friendly staff. Average food plus a little overpriced for the quality of taste. Plates can be more innovative and decorative as they were very simple for an ordinary Chinese. Entertainer vouchers are available but only on certain meals so customers need to be careful while placing their order.. :(

title: Lunch Break
text: Excellent location with a beautiful view of Corniche Beach. Friendly staff. Quiet atmosphete. Average food but desserts to die for. Worth a visit to try.

title: Business Meeting
text: Excellent location for a business and collaboration meeting. Very relaxing atmosphere and very friendly and accommodating staff.. special thanks to the Hotel Manager Joulian and Dayana Events Assistant for making my meeting so successful. Totally recommended!!
place: Radisson Blu Hotel & Resort, Abu Dhabi Corniche

title: Business Meeting
text: One of my favorite places to have meetings during the weekdays. Very friendly and cozy atmosphere and always relaxing to talk about any matters. Totally recommended!

title: Friend Tour
text: I often get friends to visit me from around the world and the Observation Deck is always one of their favorite attractions. Amazing view of Abu Dhabi. My favorite time to visit is always near sunset and at night. Once finished you may also try out some of their fantastic restaurants in Jumeirah Etihad Towers.

title: Local Wedding
text: Excellent, Excellent, Excellent! Beautiful location with an amazing view of the Grand Canal. Such a peaceful location to gather with friends or family for a fun afternoon or evening outing. I visit often with friends to relax and simply chill and have a good time.. Must visit attraction with a variety of tastes for all those foodies that enjoy new experiences! :)
place: The Ritz-Carlton Abu Dhabi, Grand Canal

title: Business meeting
text: Excellent setting. Fabulous sourrounding scenery for the special business invitation. My guest had an amazing time and the food and drinks were just perfect.. totally recommend the visit to be with nature and fabulous sites. Must visit

title: Social Lunch
text: Excellent setting in Marina Mall Abu Dhabi. Beautiful setting and warm atmosphere. We had a hreat time the service was excellent but the food below average for Lebanese cuisine. For sure not value for money. More attention should be placed on flavor rather than setting. Worth a visit

title: Business event
text: Best experience ever!! Pindar sailing and then pool bar with Rimsan and his staff at Jumeirah Etihad Towers with fine dine and wine!! Must experience during Abu Dhabi tour!! Totally recommended to takd a sunset cruise and then have a fine dine and wind ag etihad pool bar. Enjoy my friends this fabulous experience that is once in a lifwtime

title: Business Lunch
text:
Excellent! Excellent! Excellent!
Excellent food, excellent service, excellent atmosphere! My business was a success and at a reasonable budget. My guests had a lovely time and a memorable experience. I totally recommend you try it at least once for lunch. As for the evening their prices change and gets a bit expensive! :(

title: Coffee Morning
text: Excellent place to meet your friends friends and chat over a nice cup of coffee. There are many places to choose from and also some great bargains at the shops. One of my favorites malls in Abu Dhabi as it is quiet small but very convenient. For those that have time you can also visit the old souk which is connected to the mall which also has some awesome shops full of spices and souvenirs! Hope you enjoy it as much as I do!

title: Entertainer Lunch
text: Had an excellent lunch with my friends for an amazing price as we used two of our Entertainer vouchers to get a 50% off on our main meals. All are meals were amazing and we all loved the atmosphere at the SOUK which is located in WTC Mall in the city centre. Totally awesome, must try and with this lovely weather now enjoy your outside sitting.

title: Tuesday Outing!
text: I visited Essence last week with a friend for an early buffet dinner. Unfortunately, it did not come close to my high expectations. The food was actually average and below even though it looked delicious. Was for sure not value for money! I certainly do not plan to go there again!! As for the staff they were all really amazing and friendly. Well done staff for your great team spirit at the restaurant and the awesome service you provide to all the customers. Totally friendly environment! Thank You!

title: Cancer Awareness Team Building Event
text:
Excellent!! Awesome!! Fascinating! Exciting!! A must do experience while in Abu Dhabi as we had a fantastic sun set sailing event while at the same time worked together as a team to make our sailing experience even more spectacular. Special thanks to the world recognized skipper Stuart Jackson that sailed around the world twice with the same yacht as he trained our team to sail!! Also thanks to his friendly crew for being so kind and helpful to our team!!
A 5 star experience!!
Must do! Lots of fun!

title: Holiday Brunch
text:
Excellent! Excellent! Excellent! Best breakfast in Cyprus. Delicious local and international food with fresh fruit and tasty delicacies!! For the more demanding there is fresh salmon and bubbly champagne. Special thanks to the hostess Mrs. Sotiroulla for her exquisite service along with her beautiful and hospitable smile!! Will definitely visit Again and Again!
Well done Grecian Park team...

title: Larnaka by night
text: Best place to go out and have some fun in Larnaca!! Fine DJ. music, excellent service and fantastic wine and dine!! If you are a sushi lover make sure you order a platter!! An excellent way to spend the night with friends!! Fun... fun... fun!

title: Excellent Location!
text: A little bit over-rated but it has an excellent location! It is situated in the heart of Larnaca right across from the sea front. It has easy access to the town as it is only a walk away and it is only a five minute drive from the international airport. From my first hand experience it is overpriced as it is just an average boutique hotel. The breakfast can also be up-graded with champagne and strawberries to make it worth its money!

title: Malibu Beach in Cyprus
text: One of my favorite destinations in Cyprus. Best place to visit winter, spring summer or fall. Many things to do everyday such as water sports, swim, walk or just meet with friends at the most in cafe lounges of the city! Don't miss it and enjoy your day for breakfast, lunch or dinner! Plus for the more daring they can have an awesome night clubbing at famous spots but make sure you book a reservation as they are always crowded!

title: The Paris of Cyprus
text: This beautiful destination will remind you of Paris with its promenade and exclusive lights. It is a great place to go for a stroll day or night and enjoy is fabulous crystal clear waters at the beach. You can easily rent a sunbed and an umbrella for as little as 2 - 5 euros per person and simply spend your entire day there!.. Don't miss it, a must see attraction in Larnaka and for the foodies make sure you try some of their traditional dishes!

title: Nature Walk
text: As I am a lover of nature this beautiful and traditional monument is one of the most famous attractions in Larnaka. Behind this monument there is a huge nature trail park that runs over 8 kilometres and will take you to the Salt Lake of Larnaka. If you are a nature lover make sure you try this nature trail. I am sure you will love it but avoid the months of July-August as the heat might be too much to handle!

title: Totally Traditional!
text: If you are a lover of Greek food then this is the place you must eat at least once! Militzis is one of the oldest traditional restaurants of Larnaca. You will always get value for money and eat excellent traditional food with an awesome view of the beach! If you are not sure what to order just have a Greek salad and tell the waiters to bring you their traditional food. I am sure you will love it!!! My favourite is wine marinated souvla!

title: Beat the Heat Day!
text: Excellent way to beat the heat with a special beat the heat offer from Jumeira Etihad Towers. We had an all day beach and pool access and for lunch we had one of the best steaks I ever tasted in Abu Dhabi, which was all part of the package!!! For dessert we had fruits which were allowed to be taken to the beach area. I totally recommend it, enjoy it with family or friends. Also happy hours begins at 5pm so be ready!

title: Lunch with friends!
text: Excellent!! Excellent! Excellent! Last Thursday I went with friends for lunch at Sofra in Shangri La and we had some of the best food in Abu Dhabi. From sushi to fresh fish and prawns, local and international cuisine all cooked fresh for you right in front of your eyes!! And for those sweet tooth lovers make sure you try their delicious desserts from freshly made crepes, tarts, pies, cakes and even ice cream!! Totally worth every penny!! Loved it!!
place: Shangri-La Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi

title: Breakfast with friends!!
text: Was an excellent experience and some of the most delicious pastries ever tasted!! Especially the apple muffins and almond croissants!! If you are a fan of morning buffet you must try out breakfast at Fairmont!! I had the best omellete that was made just for me with the perfect portion of vegetables and cheese!! I totally loved it and everything was complimented with the warm and friendly hospitable service from their staff!! Well done Cuisine team and keep up the great work!!

title: Afternoon High Tea with Friends
text: We booked an afternoon High Tea with friends but ended up less than satisfied as it was not value for money. With our surprise it was limited to one cup of tea and simple savories for a price that was almost the same as a full buffet meal at their restaurants. Think twice before booking. As for the service, I would like to thank the staff for their hospitality and great assistance!

title: Summer 2018
text: One of the most popular beaches in Abu Dhabi. I don't personally recommend it as it gets extremely crowded. Also at certain occasions you might be bitten by a jellyfish, so be prepared! Swim at your own risk!

title: Summer Swim
text: My favorite beach in Abu Dhabi! It is always clean and beautiful at any time of the year. I always enjoy swimming in this lovely beach as its golden sand will make you feel relaxed and content with nature! An extremely pleasing experience!!

title: Not Cheap, Hidden Costs!
text: I had an emergency visit from Abu Dhabi to Larnaka and had to book a last minute ticket which cost me the same as any other airlines. You must be careful with hidden fees such as luggage and food consumption. I felt I was flying with a low class airlines as there were no movies on board or complimentary drinks. As for the staff they were always very polite and friendly along with an excellent landing and take off by the captain.

title: Business Trip
text: I had the worst experience ever on my return flight from Cyprus to Abu Dhabi. I had an emergency visit to my family and had to be there and back to work on specific dates. Hence I did not have any other choice I traveled through Egypt and had a horrific experience. Be ready to wait for long lines and long transit. In addition there was no entertainment on board so take on your own or bring a pillow!

title: View from the top
text:
Amazing view and excellent atmosphere. Went with friends after booking our reservation and had a gorgeous evening with sunset view of the whole of Dubai. Fine dine and wine at reasonable prices. A must do while in Dubai. At least once! Totally worth the experience. I loved it, especially the one minute elevator ride to the 124th floor!!
Enjoy the ride!!

title: Spectacular evening
text: Excellent!! Magical!! Mesmerising! Breath taking!! I love it!! No matter how many times you visit and watch this spectacular dancing water fountain you never seem to get enough.. every half hour with a different tune and dancing technique. Don't miss it!! My favourite is Thriller by Michael Jackson!! Don't miss it!!

title: Excellent Transport in Dubai
text: The fastest and easiest way to travel around Dubai. Avoid the traffic and the extra costs while visiting the city. Get your Metro card at any of the main offices and then use it and upgrade it whenever you need. Try to avoid the rush hours and enjoy the ride which is always on time!!

title: Enchanting visit to the Aquarium
text: At first I was hesitant but then my teenage son convinced me to visit the Aquarium and underwater zoo. It was totally worth the money but make sure you have enough time to visit this magical underwater creatures. Unfortunately, we had to cut our visit short as it was nearly closing time. A great experience for people of all ages, don't miss it while visiting Dubai Mall! Be ready to take some amazing photos!!

title: The Best Ever!
text: I stayed here with a friend and it was one of the best experiences of my life! Everything you can imagine sun, sea and great resort! Wake up in the morning and enjoy the international breakfast that is suitable for any taste bud! Enjoy the night time view of the beach and have a magical experience at the walk strolling the night away. Friendly staff and five star service right in the middle of the city center. I totally loved everything about it!

title: At the top of Burj Khalifa!!
text: Don't miss this view!! I visited the atmosphere restaurant at the top of Burj Khalifa and it was totally worth the excitement and view. 124 floors in less then a minute elevator ride and you are there!! Must do it at least once while in Dubai. Ask for the booking prices while making the reservations. There is a minimum charge per person but always affordable.. Enjoy your meal at this magical destination. I Did!!

title: Love is at Empire State Building
text: Don't miss this spectacular place where so many films have been made by hollywood! Just visiting this historical tower makes you feel the magic of love and scenes from favourite films like Sleepless in Seatle. Totally worth the visit. I loved it!!

title: Bubbly ladies night!
text: Wednesday is usually bubbly ladies night but was not so bubbly as Jazz Bar now offers just one drink to each lady. Then everything else is full price. Unfortunately, no happy hours until after 11pm and that's not on all drinks! So ladies, if you would like to enjoy a night out and reach deep into your wallet visit jazz bar. It has excellent food and service which I highly recommend and a new band with more soul and jazz music!!

title: Business Lunch
text: Excellent Saudi food with reasonable prices anyone can afford. Tempt to try the special Hareesh meal which is totally traditional in this region. It's made from well cooked wheat and lamb. It's usually served on special occasions such as Ramadan and weddings. Worth the visit!

title: Central Park Stroll!
text: While in New York do not give up the opportunity to stroll in Central Park one of the most magical parks I have ever visited. Full of life and stories from all around the world. Enjoy a bike ride for the more athletic or a horse carriage ride for the more romantic. Plan your day as there are many things to do and see in this beautiful park located right in the center of Manhattan!

title: Brooklyn Bridge History
text: It was amazing passing over this bridge while visiting Manhattan because of its history and its structure. You could never imagine how it was constructed and how many people travel on this bridge every singe day. It is one of the most beautiful sites in New York and you must experience the ride while visiting!!

title: Staten Fun Ferry!
text: During our visit to New York we stayed in Staten Island and used the ferry every day to commute to Manhattan free of charge! It is a fun mesmerizing experience to ride the ferry and enjoy the view of Manhattan and the Statue of Liberty day or night! Don't miss the ride! Extremely fun:)

title: Time Square Never Sleeps!
text: Life is not complete without the experience of Times Square! Feel the magic of all the people and fun things to do in the streets. Feel free to dance, have a drink or even have a yoga experience. See the magical lights and feel the energy generate your body. New York is truly the city that never sleeps!

title: Must See Radio City
text: Your visit will not be complete if you do not visit Radio City Music Hall with its years of history and music. Take up a show or just stroll inside for a sneak preview. We did and was totally worth it!!

title: A great place to relax at Bryant Park!
text: Visit Bryant Park which is located in the center of Manhattan and enjoy the energy of the city by having your afternoon coffee or snack. A truly magical place to be with fun filled activities for the whole family!

title: New York Experience
text: A visit to New York will not be complete without the Grand Central Terminal. We used it a number of times to get around the city. You may also use the telephone services for information in case you have any questions. Be part of New York and enjoy the ride!!

title: Summer Holiday
text: Excellent destination to visit with friends and family. Grab the statue cruises from battery park and get ready for a marvelous experience. Careful from fraud as some companies do not drop you off to see the statue of liberty from up close but just provide a ferry ride around the island. During your visit make sure you take a tour with the forest ranger. It's free of charge and tells you all you need to know about the statue and Ellis Island!! Enjoy the beautiful view of Manhattan while visiting be prepared to take lots of photos

title: New York Grayline Bus Tours
text: Excellent tours, friendly staff and always on time! We booked the 72 hours and were able to use it day and night to get around New York. We managed to see all of uptown and downtown New York plus do our shopping with minimum amount of walking. Ask for the best price they can offer before buying. Sometimes you can make a deal for an extra day!!
place: Grayline Day Tours: Romantic Road: Rothenburg and Harburg

title: Manhattan Experience
text: A beautiful view of Manhattan skyline can be seen from the ferry of Staten island which is offered for free to all passengers. You may get on the ferry from Staten Island ferry which is near Battery Park. It will also pass you near the statue of Liberty if you don't have time to visit. Enjoy the beautiful view!!

title: Lifetime experience!
text: The city that never sleeps is a place you must experience once in a lifetime. The energy you will receive from the melting pot of NEW YORK is beyond imaginary!! Never felt so alive anywhere else in the world. Visit New York and feel the magic.

title: Excellent flight with Etihad 380
text: Even though it was a long journey from Abu Dhabi to New York the friendly staff made it very accommodating. Was a smooth flight and managed to sleep most of the trip. While awake had a chance to catch up with the latest movies. Totally recommend it! Special thanks to the pilots for making our trip special!

title: World football cup outing
text: The place to be if you want to watch the world cup with friends with good food and special offers on many drinks starting from 15aed.. compliments to the chef for all the tasty appetizers. Enjoy your night out and be prepared for a great atmosphere with lots of noise! :)

title: Coffee Morning
text: An excellent place to meet with friends as many cafes open from 7:30. The light chill out music makes it even better to relax and enjoy your breakfast with friends. Eat, drink, socialise all in one. A variety of prices always depending on your budget.. my favourite chill place this time of the year

title: Iftar at Pepper
text:
We had a great time with tasty food mainly local and some international. The selection was smaller than expected but more than enough to satisfy our needs. We were 24 different nationalities together for one occasion. Staff was very friendly but too busy to accommodate the venue. Special thanks to the duty manager that took special care of us.
I guess we always get what we pay for. Worth the visit!

title: Historical & Cultural
text: Possibly one of my most loved places in Larnaca, Cyprus. Its an ancient site located in the heart of the city with many cite coffee shops around it. You can see the thick stonebuilt walls from inside and out of the church. It also has one of the most beautiful handcrafted bell chamber. If you love history and appreciate culture it's a must visit occasion. Make sure to dress properly for your visit as visitors are not allowed to wear shorts or beachhead during the visit..

title: Last Iftar
text: Excellent!! Five star service and five star food. Last night we had our last iftar with friends and colleagues and had an amazing experience. Possibly one of the best I tried in Abu Dhabi. Well done Ginger Restaurant team and management. Will see you again soon for sure!! Eid Mubarak

title: Outing with friends!
text: Amazingly all worked well even though it was the month of fasting.. The friendly staff was always at our service and the happy hours continued as usual.. Too bad no ladies night but hope everything will be back to normal soon. Too hot to sit outside now and could be a bit smoky inside. Something the bar needs to consider for its customers. As for the food, I totally recomend all its mini bites, especially my favourite nachos with meat. Excellent choice!!
place: Coopers Bar & Restaurant - Park Rotana Abu Dhabi
